content: One of the 2019 #argonaut projects is an implementation guide for using CDS Hooks to address PAMA requirements for advanced imaging orders -- to call out to an external CDS system when placing an order. Are there folks here who have already built CSD Hooks-based solutions in this space? Anyone who's become a "qualified CDSM" under PAMA? I'd love ot understand the state of play as we get started, and to make sure we've got the right folks around the table.
